The advantage of the Shape interface is its increased flexibility
For example, Line2D, or Arc2D, or - most importantly - Path2D
It also supports cubic curve parts (splines - not Catmull-Rom, but Bezier), with the Path2D#curveTo method (and the somewhat simpler quadTo method)
The Path2D class also allows you to assemble multiple shapes, arbitrarily, with the Path2D#append method
